mapper.insert: insert into users(username, password, email, nickname, profile_image, role, provider, provider_id, verified, created_at) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, 'USER', #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{verified}, now())
mapper.select: select * from users where username=#{data} or email=#{data}
select * from users where provider=#{provider} and provider_id=#{providerId}
mapper.update: update users set password=#{password} where email=#{email}
update users set verified='T' where email=#{email}
